title: Groundwater
creator_credit: Bert Van Bork and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Explains the origins of groundwater and the relation of groundwater to the water cycle. Emphasizes the need for conservation and protection of the water supply from chemical and nuclear waste.
